get.description: Retrieve service bodies for authenticated user

404.description: Returns when no service body exists.

message.example: The parent id field must be present. (and 1 more error)

items.example: The parent id field must be present.
The editor user ids field must be present.

401.description: Returns when user is not authenticated

403.description: Returns when user is unauthorized to perform action.

get.description: Retrieve a single service body by id

404.description: Returns when no service body exists.

message.example: The parent id field must be present. (and 1 more error)

items.example: The parent id field must be present.
The editor user ids field must be present.

401.description: Returns when user is not authenticated

403.description: Returns when user is unauthorized to perform action.

delete.description: Deletes a single service body by id

404.description: Returns when no service body exists.

409.description: Returns when service body has dependant resources.

message.example: You cannot delete a service body while other service bodies or meetings are assigned to it.

patch.description: Patches a single service body by id

404.description: Returns when no service body exists.

message.example: The username field is required. (and 1 more error)

401.description: Returns when user is not authenticated
Returns when token is invalid or missing.
Returns when token is invalid or missing.

message.example: The username field is required. (and 1 more error)

401.description: Returns when user is not authenticated

403.description: Returns when user is unauthorized to perform action.

delete.description: Deletes a single user by id
